title: inba vazhi iduvE engaL
sahitya:
inba vazhi iduvE engaL EsunAthar mozhi ellArkkum poduvE


anupallavi

  tunbattait-tuDaittiDum marundE adu sholla sholla migha sukham tarum virundE


caraNam 1    kuruviyum aruviyum pOlvOm malar kumudammum amudamum pOlvOm
konjum kuzhandai yAvOmE anbu koNDu kulAviDuvOmE
    caraNam 2    parama pitAvinaip-paNivOm aruT-paNigaLai sheidiDa tuNivOm
pArinil vAnarATSi viLangiDa parivu tulangiDa urimai ilangiDa
